titles: The Whig's exaltation; a pleasant new song of 82. To an old tune of 41.
author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
notes: Verse: "Now now the Tories all shall stoop, religion and the laws, and Whigs on Commonwealth ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Political ballads and songs --  England --  Early works to 1800.
